title: Additional Storage, Private Entrance, Upgraded Units Available
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Additional Storage', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Laundry Facility', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Air Conditioned', '-Private Entrance', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability is subject to change.']
